name: 520-project-benkhelifa-dragomir-iurev
description: An interactive map will be used to present differences in GDP per capita in different countries, as well as natural disasters. Users will be able to select a year and see data visualization.

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install

author: Sila Ben Khelifa, Simona Dagomir[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[Cragomir, Vasilii Iurev
